pli-tv-bi-vb-pc17:2.1: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc17:3.1: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc17:4.1: The sub-chapter on the dark of the night
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc17:5.1: 17. The training rule on spreading out without asking for permission
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc17:6.1: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc17:6.2: At that time a number of nuns were traveling through the Kosalan country on their way to Sāvatthī, when one evening they arrived at a certain village. There they approached a brahmin family and asked for a place to stay.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc17:6.6: While they were waiting the nuns put out their bedding, and some sat down on it while others lay down.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc17:6.7: When that brahmin returned at night, he said to his wife,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc17:6.10: “Throw out these unchaste, shaven-headed ones.” And he had them thrown out of the house.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc17:7.1: Then those nuns went to Sāvatthī, where they told the nuns.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc17:7.2: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized them,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc17:7.3: “How can nuns approach families at the wrong time, put out their bedding without asking the lay people for permission, and then sit down and lie down on it?” …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc17:7.4: “Is it true, monks, that nuns did this?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc17:7.7: How can nuns approach families at the wrong time, put out their bedding without asking the lay people for permission, and then sit down and lie down on it?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc17:7.8: This will not give rise to confidence in those without it …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc17:7.9: And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule thus:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc17:8.1: ‘If a nun approaches families at the wrong time, puts out her bedding without asking the lay people for permission, or gets it put out, and then sits down or lies down on it, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc17:9.4: … The nun who has been given the full ordination by both complete Orders through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc17:11.2: there are four kinds of families: aristocratic families, brahmin families, merchant families, worker families.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc17:12.1: Without asking the lay people for permission:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc17:12.2: not having asked permission from a person in that family who has authority to approve it.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc17:13.6: she gets someone else to put it out.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc17:13.8: if she sits down on it, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc17:13.10: if she lies down on it, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc17:14.1: If she has not asked for permission, and she does not perceive that she has, and she sits down or lies down on the bedding after putting it out or getting it put out, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc17:14.2: If she has not asked for permission, but she is unsure of it, and she sits down or lies down on the bedding after putting it out or getting it put out, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc17:14.3: If she has not asked for permission, but she perceives that she has, and she sits down or lies down on the bedding after putting it out or getting it put out, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc17:15.1: If she has asked for permission, but she does not perceive that she has, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc17:15.2: If she has asked for permission, but she is unsure if she has, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc17:15.3: If she has asked for permission, and she perceives that she has, there is no offense.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc17:16.2: if she first asks for permission, and then, after putting out the bedding or getting it put out, sits down or lies down;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc17:16.6: if she is the first offender.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc17:17.1: The seventh training rule is finished.
